name: RS Downloader
short_description: Develop a script using perl to download multiple files from rapidshare. The script reads a textfile to get all the links from a file and downloads the compressed parts of the file. If a link gives an error it will save it in a bucket to try to download it later. After the download the script checks if the bucket is empty. If the bucket is not empty then makes an error file with all the failed links. If the bucket is empty the script changes directory to the folder created and uncompressed the file depending on the format. If the decompression was successful it will deletes every compressed file. The script only works with a valid account from rapidshare.
summary: Script to download rapidshare files with an account
